import React, { Component } from "react"; import $ from "jquery"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { fetchGift, fetchGiftCategories } from "../actions/giftActions"; import setSelect2 from "../assets/js/setSelect2"; const bgImage = { "backgroundImage": "url(https://havan.vteximg.com.br/arquivos/ids/3270937-1200-1200/aparelho-de-jantar-e-cha-rosas-20-pecas-biona-1-21.jpg?v=636669152638700000)" } class PresentesAdminEditar extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); } componentDidMount(){ const id = this.props.match.params.id; this.props.dispatch(fetchGift(id)); this.props.dispatch(fetchGiftCategories()); } render() { const {gifts} = this.props; const {item, error, loadingOne} = gifts; const {giftsCategories} = gifts; console.log(gifts) var gift = {}; if(item[0]){ setSelect2(gift.category_id); } if(item[0] && !loadingOne){ gift = item[0]; } return (
